selected_quotes: Rituximab for follicular lymphoma delays need for chemotherapy compared with watchful waiting #lylnhf #LancetOncology
Rituximab vs observ in advanced-stage, asymptomatic, non-bulky follicular NHL - Ardeshna et al.
Better mental well-being if #lymphoma treated vs. watch-and-wait; same survival. Appropriate use of #chemo? #cancer
Better mental well-being if lymphoma tx vs. watch-and-wait; same survival. Appropriate use of #chemo? @thelancetoncol

citation.abstract: Patients with advanced-stage, low-tumour-burden follicular lymphoma have conventionally undergone watchful waiting until disease progression. We assessed whether rituximab use could delay the need for chemotherapy or radiotherapy compared with watchful waiting and the effect of this strategy on quality of life (QoL).
citation.title: Rituximab versus a watch-and-wait approach in patients with advanced-stage, asymptomatic, non-bulky follicular lymphoma: an open-label randomised phase 3 trial.
